title: Spanish with Lady - Learn Spanish in a Fun and Effective Way

heroHeader.title: Welcome to
heroHeader.description: Learn Spanish in a Fun and Effective Way!

hero.headline: Start Your Journey to Spanish Today
hero.subheadline: Whether you're a beginner or advanced, my classes are designed to take you to the next level.
hero.subheadline2: ¡Together, we'll make sure you speak Spanish fluently and confidently!

features.Title: Free Level Assessment
features.text: We start with a personalized level test to identify your strengths and areas for improvement.

features.Title: Follow-Up and Feedback
features.text: I provide constant follow-up with exercises between classes, so you always know what to improve and how to progress faster.

features.Title: Personalized Online Classes
features.text: Whether you want to improve your grammar, practice conversation, or learn specific vocabulary for your profession, the classes are tailored to your goals.

features.Title: Classes Tailored to You
features.text: Every student is unique, which is why I adapt my classes to your level, goals, and learning pace. From beginners to advanced learners, you'll find a program designed for your needs.

features.Title: Certified Teacher
features.text: With over four years of experience teaching Spanish to French speakers, I guarantee effective learning. My methods are proven!

features.Title: Flexibility and Comfort
features.text: Learn from wherever you want and whenever you want with online classes. You choose the schedule that suits you best.

features.Title: Exclusive Resources
features.text: Access educational materials such as guides, exercises, podcasts, and more to complement your classes and enhance your learning.

carousel.Title: What Some of My Students Say
carousel.text: Don't just take my word for it. Here's what my students from around the world have to say about their experience with me as their Spanish teacher.

trial.title: Are You Ready to Speak Spanish with Confidence?
trial.subtitle: You can have a 30-minute trial class with me, no strings attached.
trial.description: Join many satisfied students who have achieved their goals with my Spanish classes.

contact.title: Contact me today
contact.description: ¡Don't hesitate to contact me! I will be happy to assist you.
contact.ready: If you are ready to start, you can book your first free trial lesson by clicking on the button below, it will be an excellent opportunity to get to know us and evaluate your level of Spanish!
